title: Fact Check: Old picture from Assam floods shared as recent | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Following the massive floods in Assam, a picture of a woman with a kid has surfaced on the internet in which she can be seen stuck with a kid on the roof of a hut which is submerged in the floodwater.

It is being claimed that the picture is recent, targeting a section of media for focusing on Amitabh Bachchan’s hospitalisation due to COVID-19 and ignoring the flooding in Assam.

ALSO READ: This is NOT the proposed design of Ram temple…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be misleading.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the same picture in a report dated July 12, 2019, by Indian Express.

According to the report, it was a PTI picture taken in 2019 in Assam.

Hence, in conclusion, it is safe to say that the picture is old.
